plot: Edward Rosemore seems to have it all, a thriving shipping company and a fine family on a splendid seaside estate. But he's terminally ill, and his heir Cormick not really interested to learn the ropes. As a last dream, he hired George Armstrong to captain his vast sailing yacht in the blue Cup. Actually that has an alternative motive, George being the biological father of his daughter Eve.
title: "Rosamunde Pilcher" Der gestohlene Sommer

Actually that has an alternative motive, George being the biological father of his daughter Eve.
